text: Hicham El Gaoui is a Dutch kickboxer and K-1 fighter who competes in the cruiserweight division. As of 1 August 2020, he is ranked the #8 middleweight in the world by Combat Press.https://combatpress.com/2020/08/combat-press- kickboxing-rankings-august-2020/ ==Titles== * 2015 World Fighting League -84 kg Tournament ChampionUitslagen World Fighting League * 2014 Enfusion Live World Champion -80 kg (1 Title Defence) * 2012 Tatneft Arena World Cup 2012 Runner-up -80 kg ==Professional kickboxing record== {| class="toccolours" style="width:100%; clear:both; margin:1.5em auto; font-size:85%; text- align:center;" |- ! colspan="2" style="background:darkGrey;"| Professional Kickboxing Record |- valign="top" | 51 Wins (6 (T)KO's), 7 Losses, 2 Draw, 1 No Contest {| class="wikitable" style="width:100%;" |- style="background:#ddd;" !
